trans-unit.source: Source Control
trans-unit.target: 原始檔控制

trans-unit.source: No source control providers registered.
trans-unit.target: 沒有任何原始檔控制提供者註冊。

trans-unit.source: Source Control
trans-unit.target: 原始檔控制

trans-unit.source: Show Git
trans-unit.target: 顯示 Git

trans-unit.source: Source Control
trans-unit.target: 原始檔控制

trans-unit.source: Show SCM
trans-unit.target: 顯示 SCM

trans-unit.source: View
trans-unit.target: 檢視

trans-unit.source: SCM
trans-unit.target: 原始碼管理 (SCM)

trans-unit.source: Controls whether to show the Source Control Provider section even when there's only one Provider registered.
trans-unit.target: 控制即使只註冊一個提供者，是否依然要顯示 [原始檔控制提供者] 區段。

trans-unit.source: Controls how many providers are visible in the Source Control Provider section. Set to `0` to be able to manually resize the view.
trans-unit.target: 控制原始檔控制提供者區段中可看到的提供者數目。設定為 `0` 可手動調整檢視的大小。

trans-unit.source: Show the diff decorations in all available locations.
trans-unit.target: 顯示所有可用位置中的 Diff 裝飾。

trans-unit.source: Show the diff decorations only in the editor gutter.
trans-unit.target: 僅在編輯器裝訂邊中顯示 Diff 裝飾。

trans-unit.source: Show the diff decorations only in the overview ruler.
trans-unit.target: 僅在概觀尺規中顯示 Diff 裝飾。

trans-unit.source: Show the diff decorations only in the minimap.
trans-unit.target: 僅在縮圖中顯示 Diff 裝飾。

trans-unit.source: Do not show the diff decorations.
trans-unit.target: 不要顯示 Diff 裝飾。

trans-unit.source: Controls diff decorations in the editor.
trans-unit.target: 控制差異裝飾於編輯器中

trans-unit.source: Controls the width(px) of diff decorations in gutter (added & modified).
trans-unit.target: 控制裝訂邊中 Diff 裝飾的 width(px) (已新增並修改)。

trans-unit.source: Show the diff decorator in the gutter at all times.
trans-unit.target: 隨時在裝訂邊顯示 Diff 裝飾項目。

trans-unit.source: Show the diff decorator in the gutter only on hover.
trans-unit.target: 只有在暫留時，才在裝訂邊顯示 Diff 裝飾項目。

trans-unit.source: Controls the visibility of the Source Control diff decorator in the gutter.
trans-unit.target: 控制裝訂邊中的原始檔控制 Diff 裝飾項目可見度。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether inline actions are always visible in the Source Control view.
trans-unit.target: 控制是否一律在 [原始檔控制] 檢視中顯示內嵌動作。

trans-unit.source: Show the sum of all Source Control Providers count badges.
trans-unit.target: 顯示所有原始檔控制提供者計數徽章的總和。

trans-unit.source: Show the count badge of the focused Source Control Provider.
trans-unit.target: 顯示焦點原始檔控制提供者的計數徽章。

trans-unit.source: Disable the Source Control count badge.
trans-unit.target: 停用原始檔控制計數徽章。

trans-unit.source: Controls the Source Control count badge.
trans-unit.target: 控制「原始碼控制」的計數標記。

trans-unit.source: Show the repository changes as a tree.
trans-unit.target: 以樹狀結構顯示存放庫變更。

trans-unit.source: Show the repository changes as a list.
trans-unit.target: 以清單顯示存放庫變更。

trans-unit.source: Controls the default Source Control repository view mode.
trans-unit.target: 控制預設原始檔控制存放庫檢視模式。

trans-unit.source: Controls whether the SCM view should automatically reveal and select files when opening them.
trans-unit.target: 控制當開啟檔案時 SCM 檢視是否應自動顯示並選取檔案。

trans-unit.source: S&&CM
trans-unit.target: SCM(&&C)

trans-unit.source: SCM: Accept Input
trans-unit.target: SCM: 接受輸入

trans-unit.source: Source Control Providers
trans-unit.target: 原始檔控制提供者

trans-unit.target: 原始檔控制

trans-unit.source: {0} pending changes
trans-unit.target: {0} 個暫止的變更

trans-unit.source: Toggle View Mode
trans-unit.target: 切換檢視模式

trans-unit.source: {0} of {1} changes
{0} of {1} change
Show Previous Change
trans-unit.target: 顯示上一個變更

trans-unit.source: Show Next Change
trans-unit.target: 顯示下一個變更

trans-unit.source: Next &&Change
trans-unit.target: 下一個變更(&&C)

trans-unit.source: Previous &&Change
trans-unit.target: 上一個變更(&&C)

trans-unit.source: Move to Previous Change
trans-unit.target: 移至上一個變更

trans-unit.source: Move to Next Change
trans-unit.target: 移至下一個變更

trans-unit.source: Editor gutter background color for lines that are modified.
trans-unit.target: 修改中的行於編輯器邊框的背景色彩

trans-unit.source: Editor gutter background color for lines that are added.
trans-unit.target: 新增後的行於編輯器邊框的背景色彩

trans-unit.source: Editor gutter background color for lines that are deleted.
trans-unit.target: 刪除後的行於編輯器邊框的背景色彩

trans-unit.source: Minimap gutter background color for lines that are modified.
trans-unit.target: 已修改行的縮圖裝訂邊背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: Minimap gutter background color for lines that are added.
trans-unit.target: 新增之行的縮圖裝訂邊背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: Minimap gutter background color for lines that are deleted.
trans-unit.target: 已刪除行的縮圖裝訂邊背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: Overview ruler marker color for modified content.
trans-unit.target: 已修改內容的概觀尺規色彩。

trans-unit.source: Overview ruler marker color for added content.
trans-unit.target: 已新增內容的的概觀尺規色彩。

trans-unit.source: Overview ruler marker color for deleted content.
trans-unit.target: 已刪除內容的的概觀尺規色彩。
